name: Back To The Tang Dynasty (Demo)
description:
It's a very short demo experience.

One day, I was laid off by the company. When I went to the administration department to check out, a flash of light hit the building. I passed out.

 When I woke up, I found a strange world. The buildings here are in ancient style, and people are gone.

Is it a dream or a reality? I need to find out.
